name: Finger Freakout
description:
Bandits are on the loose! Are there any brave souls who dare to hunt them down? Hey you! I see some mighty girth in your fingers, care to lend a hand? 

That's right! Using only your fingers you can shoot down the bandits in this exciting carnival minigame! Gain points and aim to reach the highest score! ...But try not to hit any civilians while you're at it... 

Ready? Welcome to Finger Freakout!



FEATURES:
  • Fast-paced shooter gameplay
  • A fun attraction with lots of personality
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 400 MB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard / Mouse
CONTROLS: Left Mouse ButtonFireRight Mouse ButtonTauntESCEnd Round CREDITS:

Animation - Jacky Coh   /   (Youtube)

Graphics - Vincent Lu

Programming - Christos Kalanidis   /   (YouTube)
